item.title: By: brian
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: Ah, so <i>that’s</i> why we’ve been doing this blog. Ladies and gentlemen, the owl of Minerva has left the building...<br/>No, but seriously, this has been a really useful tool, and one that's been more useful the more it has been used. Note to self: blog more, whine less.
item.content:encoded:
Ah, so that’s why we’ve been doing this blog. Ladies and gentlemen, the owl of Minerva has left the building…
No, but seriously, this has been a really useful tool, and one that’s been more useful the more it has been used. Note to self: blog more, whine less.
